sentences: Hikaru Ohsawa (大沢 ひかる, Ōsawa Hikaru, born March 9, 1995, in Tokyo, Japan) is a former Japanese actress who was represented by the talent agency Stardust Promotion.
In 2010, Ohsawa is affiliated with her current office, Stardust Promotion.
From January 11, 2014, she served as a reporter of King's Brunch.
